reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thornton's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chang makes complex topics easy to understand and provides great real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee knows her subject well, but her lectures can be a bit dry. More interactive sessions would be helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson's passion for history is contagious. His anecdotes make the subject come alive.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is an excellent teacher. Her lab sessions are well-organized and her explanations are crystal clear.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's lectures are confusing and he seems uninterested in student questions. Needs improvement.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Wong's analysis of texts is insightful. She encourages critical thinking and class discussions.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor is knowledgeable but his pacing is too fast. More practice problems would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green's field trips and hands-on approach make learning fun and memorable. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown explains complex concepts clearly. His problem-solving strategies are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Parker's lectures are informative, but more engagement with current events would enhance the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's debates and simulations make political concepts easy to grasp. An outstanding educator!

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's passion for art is evident. Her virtual museum tours are a great addition to the course.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's lectures lack structure and real-world applications. More case studies would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's interactive teaching style and diverse language examples make her classes fascinating.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Harris encourages critical thinking and lively discussions. His Socratic method is very effective.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Simpson's field trips are great, but her lectures could use more visual aids and examples.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Moore's enthusiasm is infectious. His practical exercises really help in understanding complex concepts.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. White's cross-cultural comparisons are eye-opening. Her assignments promote deep reflection.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Turner is knowledgeable, but his teaching style is a bit monotonous. More interactive projects would help.
